abstract: Ed Sessa rolls out a smooth Tuesday puzzle for us. Oh, and I have a cold.
snippet: Ed Sessa rolls out a smooth Tuesday puzzle for us. Oh, and I have a cold.
lead_paragraph: TUESDAY'S PUZZLE - I have a cold. I'm not sure why I'm telling you this, except that I hope you'll understand if there are mistakes, as I'm currently typing this with my head on my desk. Seeing the entries FEVER and ACHY in the northern part of the grid made me want to nod and say, "Yup", but nodding and saying "Yup" would be too painful, so you'll just have to believe me when I say that they're there. I need to conserve my energy for the rest of the post.
